text: Va ʙa jod ored on zamonero, ki Alloh az xavfi dusmanaton cunon oromiaton doda ʙud, ki xoʙi saʙuke sumoro furu girift va az osmon ʙarojaton ʙorone ʙorid, to zohiri sumoro ʙa on pok kunad va ʙotinatonro az vasvasahoi sajton dur namojad va dilhojatonro ʙo saʙr kardan dar muqoʙili dusman qavi gardonad va qadamhojatonro ustuvor sozad
